author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Well, I don’t know if I finished Only a Grave Will Do or if it finished me, but safe to say that James Lloyd Dulin absolutely nailed this epic finale to the Malitu series. I mean, THIS is how you write a satisfying and emotionally resonant ending; it’s not perfect, it’s not neat, and it’s […]

The post REVIEW: Only a Grave Will Do by James Lloyd Dulin appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Only a Grave Will Do by James Lloyd Dulin
